title: Trendin' 2: Geistlectric Boogaloo 9/11: #allbuildingsmatter, Peter Thiel, Paul Krugman, Kelly Clarkson
itunes:title: Trendin' 2: Geistlectric Boogaloo 9/11: #allbuildingsmatter, Peter Thiel, Paul Krugman, Kelly Clarkson
description:
On this edition of Trendin' 2: Geistlectric Boogaloo Miles and Jamie discuss the #AllBuildingsMatter trend as a "gotcha" to #AllLivesMatter folks, Peter Thiel hosting a dinner for White Nationalists, Paul Krugman saying dumb shit on Twitter, and Kelly Clarkson "didn't want to do this job".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
